document.full_text: the papers of richard c. holbrooke, the diplomat at the center of many of america's foreign policy challenges of the last four decades, have been entrusted to the journalist george packer, who will write a book.
document.title: richard holbrooke's papers entrusted to george packer
lines_and_colors: the papers of richard c. holbrooke, the diplomat at the center of many of america's foreign policy challenges of the last four decades, have been entrusted to the journalist george packer, who will write a book.
